About Me

Hello! I'm a passionate computer programming and analysis student at Durham College, with a strong interest in frontend development, data analysis, and innovative technology solutions. My journey in programming has been fueled by curiosity and the desire to create meaningful applications that solve real-world problems.

In my studies, I’ve focused on building skills in various programming languages such as Python, Java, and SQL, as well as exploring web development frameworks like React. I enjoy taking on new challenges and am committed to continuous learning and improvement.

Skills & Expertise

  • Programming Languages: Python, Java, COBOL, SQL, PHP
  • Frontend Development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React
  • Backend Technologies: Node.js
  • Database Management: SQL, MongoDB
  • Version Control: Git & GitHub

Goals & Aspirations

I aim to become a proficient full-stack developer, with a specialization in frontend technologies such as React. In the future, I hope to work on projects that leverage artificial intelligence and machine learning, bringing smarter, more efficient applications to life. One of my long-term aspirations is to build a robust application that assists in mental health care, combining my knowledge of psychology with technology.

In addition to my technical skills, I have a background in psychology, which allows me to approach problem-solving with empathy and a focus on user experience. I believe that combining these two fields can lead to more thoughtful and impactful software development.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy camping with my family, immersing myself in nature, and finding inspiration from Korean dramas. I’m always excited to explore new ideas and collaborate on creative projects.
